body:
FIRST OFF:
I'm asking mods for permission to do these topics! I am aware that i might be punished for spam, however i just want to Find Entertaining videos for people to have a laugh at! If even ONE MOD says no, I will not do it! 
SECOND:
Will people enjoy if i do this? I have not seen anything like this on the forums, so if people would say yes, i will be happy to do it! If people say no, i will not do it! It is up to the community if they want "Daily dose of Laughs". So i'm asking the community if they would want to see it :P
THIRD:
Time... I will be asking the community IF they DO want this to happen... How often? My time offers are: Daily, 1 time per 2 days, Weekly, Monthly. If you want a CUSTOM time to suggest leave it below VVV

This is pretty much all i wanted to say, I just wanted to ask the "Community" if they want some laughs once in a while, although some videos aren't going to be funny, I just want to do it (I just got inspired somehow :/) ***I will take HATE comments/Constructive Criticism! Since i dont have youtube, might as well find something to share on youtube :P.

title: Funny video Series? [For forums]

replies.body: No. Joke :D I would say daily. Sometimes I only need something funny to be happy :D
